Title:

(CHLOROPHYCEAE), A NEW FLAGELLATED ALGA FROM MAURITANIA DESERT:
MORPHOLOGY, ULTRASTRUCTURE AND PHYLOGENETIC FRAMING1
Keywords:
tetraflagellate; 18S ribosomal RNA; ITS2;
Chlamydomonadales; Chlorophyta.
Abstract:

were used to assess the phylogenetic position of a tetraflagellate green
